entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Québec
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:24 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -0.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Quebec Lesage Int'l Airport 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
Condition: Cloudy

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow beginning this evening. Amount 15 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow or rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow changing to periods of rain near noon. Snow over northern sections. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 in the morning. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Rain showers or flurries ending after midnight then partly cloudy. Fog patches overnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
